entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 1:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -18.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: WNW 39 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
